name: Mini Traffic
description:
A colorful 2D puzzle game offering a relaxing atmosphere while testing players' reactions and puzzle-solving skills. This game is a perfect choice for those looking to unwind and challenge their mind.

New update fixes

Version_1.1.0 is available now

Control

Mouse point and click.

How to play

The objective of the game is to guide cars to their matching-color building.
The player does this by clicking on directional tiles to rotate them, thus directing the movement of the cars.

Features:

- Colorful 2D environment 
- 60 different levels 
- 2 Game modes each with a different atmosphere
- Collectible stars system
- Rest your progress anytime
